mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ISU_ISSUE WHERE REPORTED_AT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y/%m/%d') AND NOW() AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}

SELECT COUNT(T.ID) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ISU_ISSUE_HISTORY WHERE CREATED_AT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y/%m/%d') AND NOW() AND FIELD_NAME = 'RESOLUTION' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ISU_ISSUE WHERE ID = ISSUE_ID AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} ) ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT 1) T WHERE T.NEW_VALUE IN ('RESOLVED', 'UNSOLVABLE', 'NO_NEED')
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ISU_ISSUE WHERE STATUS = 'OPENED' AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND (ASSIGNED_TO IS NULL OR ASSIGNED_TO = 0)
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ISU_ISSUE WHERE STATUS = 'REOPENED' AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT ISS.ID AS ID, ISS.TITLE, ISS.DESCRIPTION, IST.DISPLAY_NAME AS STATUS, ISR.DISPLAY_NAME AS RESOLUTION, USER.NAME AS ASSIGNED_TO, IST.COLOR AS COLOR, DATE_FORMAT(ISS.UPDATED_AT, '%Y/%m/%d %T') AS UPDATED_AT FROM ISU_ISSUE ISS LEFT JOIN CM_ISSUE_STATUS IST ON IST.STATUS_CODE = ISS.STATUS LEFT JOIN CM_ISSUE_RESOLUTION ISR ON ISR.RESOLUTION_CODE = ISS.RESOLUTION LEFT JOIN AC_USER_ACCT USER ON ISS.ASSIGNED_TO = USER.ID WHERE ISS.ASSIGNED_TO = #{sp.params.userId} AND ISS.STATUS != 'CLOSED' LIMIT ${(sp.pageNo - 1) * sp.pageSize}, #{sp.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ISS.ID) FROM ISU_ISSUE ISS LEFT JOIN CM_ISSUE_STATUS IST ON IST.STATUS_CODE = ISS.STATUS LEFT JOIN CM_ISSUE_RESOLUTION ISR ON ISR.RESOLUTION_CODE = ISS.RESOLUTION LEFT JOIN AC_USER_ACCT USER ON ISS.ASSIGNED_TO = USER.ID WHERE ISS.ASSIGNED_TO = #{sp.params.userId} AND ISS.STATUS != 'CLOSED'
